IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE TO ADDICTED WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE TO ADDICTED WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN. THE FOCUS IS ON ADDICTIVE AND CO-OCCURRING DISORDERS, SPECIFICALLY TO UNDERINSURED AND UNINSURED WOMEN (INCLUDING PREGNANT WOMEN). THE RESIDENTIAL AND OUTPATIENT TREATMENT SITES OFFER AFFORDABLE PROGRAMS AND HIGHLY SKILLED, COMPASSIONATE PROFESSIONALS WHO BELIEVE THAT QUALITY TREATMENT SHOULD BE ACCESSIBLE TO EVERYONE. QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER INTEGRATES ADDICTION TREATMENT IN ITS GENDER SPECIFIC CSTAR PROGRAM ALONG WITH PSYCHIATRIC SERVICES FOR CO-OCCURRING DISORDERS. SPECIFIC RELATED SERVICES INCLUDE TRAUMA, HOUSING, TRANSPORTATION, AND CHILDCARE.
IRS990.Description: SHELTER PLUS CARE PROGRAM PROVIDES SAFE, AFFORDABLE, PERMANENT HOUSING FOR HOMELESS AND DISABLED FAMILIES THROUGH RENTAL ASSISTANCE.

Activity2.Description: WOMEN AND CHILDREN PROGRAM PROVIDES COMPREHENSIVE DRUG AND ALCOHOL TREATMENT SERVICES TO LOW INCOME, HOMELESS, ADDICTED WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN. IT ALSO OFFERS RESIDENTIAL SUPPORTIVE RECOVERY SERVICE.

Activity3.Description: ST. PHILIPPINE HOME PROVIDES THERAPEUTIC, STRUCTURED, TRANSITIONAL LIVING FOR UP TO TWO YEARS FOR HOMELESS CITY WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN.

NameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: ARCHDIOCESE OF ST LOUIS FINANCE OFFICE

OtherSecurities.Description: ST. LOUIS ARCHDIOCESAN FUND - RESTRICTED FUND

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: GRANTS ARE MONITORED THROUGH ACCOUNTANT REVIEW OF THE GENERAL LEDGER ALONG WITH MONTHLY FINANCIAL STATEMENT REVIEW BY MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER PAYS A MANAGEMENT AND BOOKKEEPING FEE TO THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS. ADDITIONALLY, A MANAGEMENT FEE IS PAID TO THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS (SLAF) FOR THE MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S INVESTMENTS. ALONG WITH THIS, THE ORGANIZATION PAYS A MANAGEMENT FEE TO CARDINAL CARBERRY SENIOR LIVING CENTER FOR MANAGEMENT OF THE CATHEDRAL TOWERS BUILDING, OF WHICH QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER IS LOCATED. ALSO, QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER PAYS THE SALARIES FOR ALL EMPLOYEES OF PEACE FOR KIDS AND IS SUBSEQUENLTY REIMBURSED BY PEACE FOR KIDS. THEREFORE, QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER ISSUES THE FORM W-2S FOR EMPLOYEES OF BOTH QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER AND PEACE FOR KIDS. DURING THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2010, QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER ISSUED 136 W-2'S COMPRISING 106 EMPLOYEES OF QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER AND 30 EMPLOYEES OF PEACE FOR KIDS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS ONE MEMBER - CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS. ADDITIONALLY, THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS IS A MEMBER WITH RESERVED POWERS OVER CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS, BY WHICH THE ARCHBISHOP ALSO HAS RESERVED POWERS OVER THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS A MEMBER WITH RESERVED POWERS OVER CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS, BY WHICH THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS ALSO HAS RESERVED POWERS OVER THE ORGANIZATION, THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS HAS THE AUTHORITY TO ELECT AND/OR APPROVE PERSONS TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AS THEY ARE MEMBERS WITH RESERVED POWERS, VARIOUS DECISIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS AND THE ARCHBISHOP OF ST. LOUIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED A .PDF COPY OF THE FORM 990 TO THE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BOARD VIA EMAIL PRIOR TO FILING OF THE TAX RETURN. THE EMAIL SENT TO THE GOVERNING BOARD REQUESTS THAT ALL MEMBERS REVIEW THE FORM 990 AS OF A SELECT DATE. ANY QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS ARE TO BE SENT TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. ONCE ALL QUESTIONS AND COMMENTS ARE REVIEWED/CLEARED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, THE FORM 990 IS ACCEPTED FOR FILING AND A REPRESENTATION LETTER IS SIGNED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. AT THIS POINT, THE FORM 990 IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: UPON MEMBERSHIP TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, PERSONS ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ADDITIONALLY, ALL OTHER OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS A SALARY ADMINISTRATION PROGRAM, INCLUDING PAY GRADES AND RANGES, THAT IS PROVIDED BY CATHOLIC CHARITIES OF ST. LOUIS. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO REVIEWS NATIONAL AND LOCAL INFLATION RATES, INTERNAL FUNDING ABILITIES, AND PLANNED SALARY BUDGETS FOR THE ARCHDIOCESE OF ST. LOUIS. ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATIONS ARE ALSO REVIEWED WHEN DETERMINING SALARY INCREASES. COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE GOVERNING BOARD. ALL OTHER EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ANYONE INTERESTED IN REVIEWING THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND/OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS MUST CONTACT THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, AS THIS INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. ADDITIONALLY, THE ORGANIZATION'S ANNUAL REPORT IS POSTED ON THE QUEEN OF PEACE CENTER WEB-SITE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Contact Addresses for Officers, Directors, Etc
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BRIAN O'MALLEY - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., ST. LOUIS, MO 63108. JOHN LALLY - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., ST. LOUIS, MO 63108. MSGR. MARK ULLRICH - 4532 LINDELL BLVD., sT. LOUIS, MO 63108.
